job_title: Medical Social Worker in San Francisco, CA
pros: Hospice of East Bay has been a great place to work. I have been here for 2 years and appreciate the culture of the company, they responded and support staff extremely well during the pandemic: offering counseling, support, mental health days off and are flexible with child care needs. The company's mission is to care for our patients and families, whatever it may take. The manager always hear us when we advocate for unique situations for our patients and they go above and beyond to provide support to the many needs of our patients and the staff. The teams work on constant collaboration and support of each other, and we always have time to pick up the phone and check in. Everyone offers to help other team members when we get a large influx of admissions. It really is like a family here. The benefits offered at Hospice East Bay are amazing as well, with Roth IRA matching programs, and great medical and dental options. Hospice of East Bay really has their HR staff on it to make it easy and beneficially for staff. It's all around a great place to work, and I would highly recommend Hospice of East Bay to anyone looking to make a difference at the end of life and feel supported and cared for by a company.
cons: none that I can think of, just usual politics and issues with vendors such as medical supply and medication delivery issues at times. But Hospice of East Bay always gets on these issues right away.
